covers.title: Foil-Stamp Duracover™
covers.specsHTML:
Cover Type: Front
Grade Levels:
Color Options: see notes
Sizes: 5" x 8"
8" x 10"
Notes:
  • Front Dura color choices include: Black, Hunter Green, Royal Blue, Navy Blue, Silver, Red, and Maroon.
  • Foil color choices include: Gold, Silver, Black, Metallic Blue, Metallic Red, Orange, Violet, and White.
  • Additional charges apply
  • One foil color per surface is standard, two foil colors per surface is extra charge and special instruction
  • A matching colored dura stock is intended to be placed on the back, to complete the look of your planner.
  • Not available on Hammond & Stephens™ and Essential Planners
covers.description: Available for an additional charge, Duracovers are made from recycled plastic and can be foil stamped for an ultra classy presentation of your planners and to really make school spirit pop! Duracover color choices include: Black, Hunter Green, Royal Blue, Navy Blue, Silver, Red, and Maroon. Eight foil colors include Gold, Silver, Black, Metallic Blue, Metallic Red, Orange, Violet and White.

covers.title: Foil-Stamp Duracover™ Back
covers.specsHTML:
Cover Type: Back
Grade Levels:
Color Options: See notes
Sizes: 5" x 8"
8" x 10"
Inside Back: Blank
Notes:
  • Back Foil Duracovers may only be used in conjunction with a Foil-Stamp Duracover front cover.
  • Foil back cover choices include a blank, colored Dura stock that matches the front cover color.
  • Front Dura color choices include: Black, Hunter Green, Royal Blue, Navy Blue, Silver, Red, and Maroon.
  • Back may also be customized with 1 or 2 foil colors on a matching Dura stock color (additional charges apply).
  • Foil color choices include: Gold, Silver, Black, Metallic Blue, Metallic Red, Orange, Violet, and White.
  • Not available on Hammond & Stephens™ and Essential Planners.
covers.description: Complete the look of your planner with a matching back Duracover™.
